name: Rajju
logic: All seven classical grahas placed only in movable signs.

name: Mushala
logic: All seven grahas only in fixed signs.

name: Nala
logic: All seven grahas only in dual signs.

name: Māla
logic: Benefics occupying any three kendras (1/4/7/10).

name: Sarpa
logic: Malefics occupying any three kendras.

name: Gada
logic: All grahas confined to any two successive kendras.

name: Sakata
logic: All grahas only in 1 and 7.

name: Vihaga
logic: All grahas only in 4 and 10.

name: Śṛṅgāṭaka
logic: All grahas only in 1, 5 and 9.

name: Hala
logic: All grahas only in (2,6,10) or (3,7,11) or (4,8,12).

name: Vajra
logic: All benefics in 1 and 7 OR all malefics in 4 and 10.

name: Yava
logic: All benefics in 4 and 10 OR all malefics in 1 and 7.

name: Kamala
logic: All seven grahas in the four kendras.

name: Vapi
logic: All seven grahas in all panaphara (2/5/8/11) OR all apoklima (3/6/9/12).

name: Yupa
logic: Seven grahas spread over 1–4.

name: Śara
logic: Seven grahas spread over 4–7.

name: Śakti
logic: Seven grahas spread over 7–10.

name: Daṇḍa
logic: Seven grahas spread over 10–1.

name: Nauka
logic: Seven consecutive houses starting at 1.

name: Kūṭa
logic: Seven consecutive houses starting at 4.

name: Chatra
logic: Seven consecutive houses starting at 7.

name: Dhanus/Chāpa
logic: Seven consecutive houses starting at 10.

name: Chakra
logic: Six alternate signs occupied from Lagna.

name: Samudra
logic: Six alternate signs occupied from 2nd house.

name: Gola
logic: All seven grahas in one sign.

name: Yuga
logic: All seven confined to two signs.

name: Śūla
logic: All seven confined to three signs.

name: Kedāra
logic: All seven confined to four signs.

name: Pāśa
logic: All seven confined to five signs.

name: Dāma
logic: All seven confined to six signs.

name: Vīṇā
logic: All seven spread over seven signs.

name: Gaja‑Keśarī
logic: Jupiter in a kendra from the Moon (not debilitated).

name: Amala
logic: A benefic in the 10th from Lagna or from Moon, unafflicted.

name: Parvata
logic: Benefics in 1st/7th; malefics in 3rd/6th (or kendras filled by benefics without malefics).

name: Kahāla
logic: 3rd lord strong and connected with 11th lord.

name: Chāmara
logic: Lagna lord strong in kendra/konas under benefic influence.

name: Śaṅkha
logic: 5th and 6th lords in mutual kendras and strong; Lagna lord in a movable sign.

name: Bherī
logic: 1st, 2nd, 7th, 10th lords in kendras; Moon with benefic.

name: Mṛdaṅga
logic: 2nd and 11th lords in kendra/trikona and strong; benefic Moon.

name: Śrīnātha
logic: 7th lord in own/exaltation with benefic aspect; Lagna lord strong.

name: Śārada
logic: Jupiter in kendra; Venus in trine; Moon & Lagna lord strong.

name: Matsya
logic: Benefics in 4th/10th; malefics in 3rd/6th.

name: Kūrma
logic: Benefics in kendras in own/exaltation.

name: Khadga
logic: 2nd and 9th lords in mutual kendra/trikona and strong.

name: Lakṣmī
logic: Lagna lord strong; Jupiter & Venus strong in kendra/trikona.

name: Kusuma
logic: Benefics in kendras; Lagna lord strong; Moon unafflicted.

name: Kālanidhi
logic: Mercury & Venus in 2nd or 11th with Jupiter’s aspect.

name: Kalpadruma (Parijāta)
logic: Lagna lord in own/exaltation; its dispositor strong; and the next dispositor also strong.

name: Trimūrti—Hari
logic: Atmakaraka strong in kendra/konas with benefic aspect.

name: Trimūrti—Hara
logic: Putrakaraka strong similarly.

name: Trimūrti—Brahmā
logic: Amsa/creative significator strong by varga and aspect.

name: Lagna‑Ādhi
logic: Benefics in 6/7/8 from Lagna (Ādhi‑type).

name: Sunāpha
logic: (Except Sun) planet(s) in 2nd from Moon.

name: Anāpha
logic: (Except Sun) planet(s) in 12th from Moon.

name: Durudhura
logic: Planets (except Sun) both 2nd and 12th from Moon.

name: Adhi from Moon
logic: Benefics in 6/7/8 from Moon.

name: Dhana from Moon
logic: Wealth combinations reckoned from Moon as Lagna.

name: Kemadruma (affliction)
logic: No planet in 2nd/12th from Moon; none in kendras from Moon; none in 2nd/12th from Lagna.

name: Vesi
logic: Any planet(s) (except Moon) in 2nd from Sun.

name: Vasi
logic: Any planet(s) (except Moon) in 12th from Sun.

name: Ubhayachari
logic: Planets (except Moon) both 2nd and 12th from Sun.

name: Ruchaka
logic: Mars in own/exaltation in a kendra.

name: Bhadrā
logic: Mercury in own/exaltation in a kendra.

name: Haṁsa
logic: Jupiter in own/exaltation in a kendra.

name: Mālavya
logic: Venus in own/exaltation in a kendra.

name: Śaśa
logic: Saturn in own/exaltation in a kendra.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 5L — conjunction
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 5L conjoin each other in any sign; both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 5L — mutual aspect
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 5L mutually aspect each other (Parāśari full drishti); both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 5L — mutual kendra
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 5L are placed in mutual kendras (1/4/7/10 from each other); both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 5L — mutual trikona
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 5L are placed in mutual trikonas (1/5/9 from each other); both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 5L — parivartana
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 5L are in mutual sign exchange (parivartana); both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 9L — conjunction
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 9L conjoin each other in any sign; both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 9L — mutual aspect
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 9L mutually aspect each other (Parāśari full drishti); both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 9L — mutual kendra
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 9L are placed in mutual kendras (1/4/7/10 from each other); both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 9L — mutual trikona
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 9L are placed in mutual trikonas (1/5/9 from each other); both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 1L (Lagna lord) with 9L — parivartana
logic: Lords 1L (Lagna lord) and 9L are in mutual sign exchange (parivartana); both have at least neutral dignity; no severe affliction.

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 5L–9L — conjunction
logic: 5th and 9th lords conjoin each other in any sign; at least one strong (own/exaltation/vargottama).

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 5L–9L — mutual aspect
logic: 5th and 9th lords mutually aspect each other (Parāśari full drishti); at least one strong (own/exaltation/vargottama).

name: Rāja‑Yoga: 5L–9L — parivartana
logic: 5th and 9th lords are in mutual sign exchange (parivartana); at least one strong (own/exaltation/vargottama).

name: Karma Rāja‑Yoga
logic: 10th lord in own/exaltation in 10th and aspecting Lagna or its lord.

name: All‑benefic Kendras
logic: All occupied kendras by benefics; no malefic in kendras.

name: Moon–Venus mutual 3/11 (case A)
logic: Moon in 3rd from Venus and Venus in 11th from Moon; mutual aspect present.

name: Moon–Venus mutual 3/11 (case B)
logic: Venus in 3rd from Moon and Moon in 11th from Venus; mutual aspect present.

name: Exalted aspects on Lagna
logic: Four or more exalted planets aspect Lagna (excluding Moon).

name: Arūḍha relations
logic: AL and Darapada in mutual kendra/trine or 3–11; benefic influence on AL.

name: Strong Vargottama Moon
logic: Vargottama Moon with aspects from four or more planets.

name: Birth moment factor
logic: Birth within ~2.5 ghatis of noon or midnight yields eminence.

name: Venus guarding gains
logic: 4/10/2/11 lords aspect Lagna; Venus aspects 11th from AL and AL holds a benefic.

logic: waxing Moon placed in the 1st with shubha argalā; no papakartari on the house.

name: Benefic in Kendra
logic: waxing Moon placed in the 4th with shubha argalā; no papakartari on the house.

name: Benefic in Kendra
logic: waxing Moon placed in the 7th with shubha argalā; no papakartari on the house.

name: Benefic in Kendra
logic: waxing Moon placed in the 10th with shubha argalā; no papakartari on the house.

name: 10L with AmK
logic: 10th lord associated with Amatyakaraka (AmK) or AmK’s dispositor; or their mutual aspect.

name: Clean 10H/11H
logic: 10th & 11th free from malefic occupation/aspect; 11th aspected by its own lord.

name: AmK with dispositor of AK
logic: AmK conjoins dispositor of Atmakaraka.

name: AK with benefic
logic: Atmakaraka conjoins/aspected by a benefic.

name: AmK in own/exaltation
logic: Amatyakaraka in own/exaltation sign.

name: AK in trines
logic: Atmakaraka in 1/5/9.

name: AK or AmK in kendras/trines
logic: Either karaka in kendra/konas.

name: War‑chief pattern
logic: Malefics in 3/6 from AK or from Arudha Lagna.

name: AK aspects 9L
logic: AK in kendra/konas/own/exaltation aspecting 9th lord.

name: Lunar‑AK ministership
logic: Moon’s sign lord as AK in Lagna with benefic → ministerial association later.

name: AK in 5/7/10/9 with benefic
logic: Yields royal wealth and favors.

name: AL(9) = Lagna or AK in 9th
logic: Arudha of 9th equals Lagna or AK in 9th.

name: 11L in 11H with protection
logic: 11th lord in own sign/own house 11th, free from malefics; AK with benefic.

name: Parivartana 1L–10L
logic: Exchange between Lagna lord and 10th lord.

name: Karakamsha 4th
logic: Venus and Moon in 4th from Karakamsha.

name: LL/AK with 5L
logic: Lagna lord or AK joined with 5th lord in kendras/trines.

name: Venu‑5 & Ma‑11
logic: Venus rules the 5th and occupies 5th; Mars in 11th.

name: Budha‑5 & Mo+Ma+Ju‑11
logic: Mercury rules 5th and occupies 5th; Moon+Mars+Jupiter in 11th.

name: Surya‑5 & Sa+Mo+Ju‑11
logic: Sun rules 5th and occupies it; Saturn+Moon+Jupiter in 11th.

name: Sun+Moon‑11 & Sat‑5 own
logic: Sun and Moon conjoined in 11th; Saturn in own sign in 5th.

name: Guru‑5 own & Budha‑11
logic: Jupiter in own sign in 5th; Mercury in 11th.

name: Ma‑5 own & Śukra‑11
logic: Mars owns 5th and sits there; Venus in 11th.

name: Chandra‑5 own & Śani‑11
logic: Moon owns 5th and sits there; Saturn in 11th.

name: Leo asc variant
logic: Leo Lagna: Sun in Leo with aspect/association of Mars & Jupiter.

name: Cancer asc variant
logic: Cancer Lagna: Moon in Cancer with Mercury & Jupiter influence.

name: Mars rising own sign
logic: Mars rising in own sign with Mercury, Venus & Saturn influence.

name: Mercury rising own sign
logic: Mercury rising in own sign with Saturn & Jupiter influence.

name: Jupiter rising own sign
logic: Jupiter rising in own sign with Mercury & Mars influence.

name: Venus rising own sign
logic: Venus rising in own sign with Saturn & Mercury influence.

name: Saturn rising own sign
logic: Saturn rising in own sign with Mars & Jupiter influence.

name: 5L–9L wealth link
logic: 5th & 9th lords strong and mutually related → wealth.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in conjunction; strength condition: both in own signs.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in conjunction; strength condition: both exalted or vargottama.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in conjunction; strength condition: either in own/exaltation and the other aspected by benefic.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual aspect; strength condition: both in own signs.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual aspect; strength condition: both exalted or vargottama.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual aspect; strength condition: either in own/exaltation and the other aspected by benefic.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in parivartana; strength condition: both in own signs.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in parivartana; strength condition: both exalted or vargottama.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in parivartana; strength condition: either in own/exaltation and the other aspected by benefic.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual kendra; strength condition: both in own signs.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual kendra; strength condition: both exalted or vargottama.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual kendra; strength condition: either in own/exaltation and the other aspected by benefic.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual trikona; strength condition: both in own signs.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual trikona; strength condition: both exalted or vargottama.

name: Lakṣmī‑type Wealth Link
logic: 5L and 9L in mutual trikona; strength condition: either in own/exaltation and the other aspected by benefic.

name: Divisional Amplifier
logic: Dignity outcome level 'Parijāta' attained for Lagna lord per varga ladder → elevates wealth results.

name: Divisional Amplifier
logic: Dignity outcome level 'Uttama' attained for Lagna lord per varga ladder → elevates wealth results.

name: Divisional Amplifier
logic: Dignity outcome level 'Gopura' attained for Lagna lord per varga ladder → elevates wealth results.

name: Divisional Amplifier
logic: Dignity outcome level 'Siṁhāsana' attained for Lagna lord per varga ladder → elevates wealth results.

name: Divisional Amplifier
logic: Dignity outcome level 'Parvata' attained for Lagna lord per varga ladder → elevates wealth results.

name: Divisional Amplifier
logic: Dignity outcome level 'Devaloka' attained for Lagna lord per varga ladder → elevates wealth results.

name: Divisional Amplifier
logic: Dignity outcome level 'Brahmaloka' attained for Lagna lord per varga ladder → elevates wealth results.

name: Divisional Amplifier
logic: Dignity outcome level 'Iravataṁsa' attained for Lagna lord per varga ladder → elevates wealth results.

name: 1L‑12H & 12L‑1H with maraka
logic: 1st lord in 12th and 12th lord in 1st with maraka influence.

name: 1L‑6H & 6L‑1H with maraka
logic: As above for 6th axis.

name: 1L‑8H with Ketu on Lagna/Moon
logic: Ascendant or Moon with Ketu while 1L in 8th.

name: 1L malefic in 6/8/12 & 2L fallen
logic: 1L with malefic in 6/8/12; 2L in enemy/debilitation.

name: 1L with dusthana lords
logic: 1L conjoins 6/8/12 lords (or Saturn) without benefic aspect.

name: 5L‑6H & 9L‑12H maraka afflicted
logic: 5L in 6th and 9L in 12th with maraka aspects.

name: Malefics in Lagna (exception noted)
logic: Malefics in Lagna (except 9L/10L) with maraka links.

name: Dusthana dispositors afflicted
logic: Dispositors of 6/8/12 lords again in 6/8/12 and afflicted.

name: Moon’s navamsa lord maraka
logic: Navamsa lord of the Moon joins maraka or sits in maraka house.

name: Rasi LL & Navamsa LL maraka
logic: Both Lagna lords (Rasi & Navamsa) under maraka influence.

name: Benefics in bad houses
logic: Benefics in inauspicious houses while malefics in auspicious ones.

name: Dasha harm by dusthana links
logic: Any planet linked to 6/8/12 lords harms finances in its dasha unless trinal lord aspects.

name: AK expense factors I
logic: 8th/12th from AK aspected by AK’s navamsa lord and Lagna lord.

name: AK expense factors II
logic: 12th from AK aspected by its dispositor or by Lagna lord.

name: Mars+Saturn in 2nd (no Mercury)
logic: Mars & Saturn together in 2nd → poverty; cancelled if Mercury aspects.

name: Sun or Saturn in 2nd with mutual aspect
logic: Sun in 2nd aspected by Saturn (or Saturn in 2nd aspected by Sun) → poverty; otherwise riches.

name: Vaapī (Nabhasa) pattern
logic: All seven grahas in all panaphara houses (2/5/8/11) OR all apoklima (3/6/9/12).

name: Vaapī (Fortune—modern usage)
logic: 5L & 9L in mutual kendra/trikona/conjunction/aspect and strong — prosperity and grace.
